text: Kristo Robo (born 7 December 1948) is an Albanian shooter who competed at the 1992 Summer Olympic Games in the 25 metre rapid fire pistol, he finished 30th, he was also the Albanian flag bearer.Sports-Reference Profile ==References== Category:Shooters at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic shooters of Albania Category:Living people Category:1948 births Category:Albanian male sport shooters
title: Kristo Robo
